name: Save Memberships in Memberstack to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time an event occurs on membership from a member in Memberstack, Make will automatically add information to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses [this example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Cjmv0NUDYSRL0QmuEXc_KNvqVsErKcj80VevTYzoWbY/edit?usp=sharing)
